mapper.select: select a.product_id as product_id, c.specification_id as specification_id, b.product_name as product_name, c.name as specification_name, a.buy_count, c.price as price from shopping_cart as a, product as b, specification as c where a.user_id = #{user_id} and a.product_id = b.product_id and b.product_id = c.product_id and a.specification_id = c.specification_id
